title: Lag while entering champ select
body: I have found that entering the champ select screen on MAC has a relatively significant delay time over the span of a few games. My in game FPS and MS have been regular (which is very smooth and fast). If any other MAC users have encountered the same issue discuss below.

replies.body: Not just MAC, everyone had this problem when we were first started. We are on a completely different client to the legacy so there may be a bit of delay sometimes when going into the lobby due to the connectivity to the legacy client.
As have I whenever I enter  it on Windows version 6.21
